Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is very worn, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and very faint traces of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394319) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394319)
